column1: #Text=Fire Nation man says : " I 'm gon na to go get a bag of sizzle crisps .
#Text=This is the circus , home of fear and danger .
#Text=I want the wind buffalo to perform tonight .
#Text=" Trainer says : " If you do n't behave yourself , you 'll regret it .
#Text=" Fire Nation man says : " Let 's go .
#Text=" Unnamed Fire Nation boy says : " See you later , buddy .
#Text=" Shuzumu says : " Ladies and gentlemen , now for something truly special .
#Text=A noble beast , so magnificent and rare , it has n't been seen by human eyes in generations .
#Text=" Unnamed Fire Nation boy says : " Run away !
#Text=" Unnamed Fire Nation boy says : " Go , you can do it .
#Text=" Trainer says : " Get back here , you stupid beast !
#Text=A sky bison is a companion for life .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess this means we 'll always be together .
